keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels

issues.brexitEurope: Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
issues.education: Independence for schools, free of Government interference.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been involved in politics since the 1970s when I worked with the Centre for Policy Studies, the IEA and the Adam Smith Institute. I have been a District Councillor, a Parish Councillor and am currently a member of the UKIP NEC and co-chairman of the Healthcare Policy Group. I will continue to campaign for national independence, individual freedom and small government, believing that the state is more often the problem than the solution.

politicalExperience.role: Co-chairman of the Healthcare Policy Group

contactInformation.address: Freepost RLSU-HZBG-UBKS, UK Independence Party, PO Box 408, Newton Abbot TQ12 9BG

leaflet.additionalNotes: My local issues are Non-government solutions wherever possible.
